# Инженерное дело [color=#f39f27]Инженерное дело[/color] is a combination of [textlink="construction" link="Construction"] work, [textlink="repair" link="ExpandingRepairingStation"] work, maintaining a death machine that happens to produce [textlink="power" link="Power"], and making sure the station contains [textlink="breathable air" link="Atmospherics"].
## Персонал [color=#f39f27]Инженерный[/color] отдел состоит из технических ассистентов, инженеров и атмосферных техников. Инженерным отделом руководит Старший Инженер.
## Инструментарий
Your core toolset is a small variety of tools. If you're an engineer, then you should have a belt on your waist containing one of each; if not, you can likely find them in maintenance shafts and in tool storage within assorted toolboxes and vending machines.
Most tasks will have explainers for how to perform them on examination; for example, if you're [textlink="constructing" link="Construction"] a wall, it'll tell you the next step if you look at it a bit closer.
